quote: Too early for me...

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Now, as we discussed in yesterday's    lesson, the wormhole was discovered    by Commander Sisko and Lieutenant    Dax earlier this year.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Does anyone know what makes this    wormhole so unusual?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Jake?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's stable... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's stable, that's right, Jake...    it's the first stable wormhole known    to exist...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (smiles, I don't wish     to interrupt)   Please... continue...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: A stable wormhole is very important    because it allows us to travel secure    in the knowledge that neither end    will shift location.  Who knows why    the wormhole is stable... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Because it was artificially    constructed.  Commander Sisko    encountered the entities who created    the wormhole when he...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Excuse me, by the "entities," do you    not mean "the prophets"... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (beat, senses the     issue)   Yes... on Bajor... the entities are    worshipped as prophets.    (beat, moving quickly     on)   Our studies of the wormhole have    shown that it was formed by unique    particles we call verterons that are    apparently self-sustaining... this    begins to explain how a ship at    impulse can safely pass through...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Ships are safely guided through the    passage by the hands of the prophets.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: In a manner of speaking...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Not apparently your manner of    speaking...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Perhaps we should discuss this    after...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Do you believe the celestial temple    of the prophets exists within the    passage... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I respect that the Bajoran people    believe it does.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: But that's not what you teach.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No, I don't teach Bajoran spiritual    beliefs.  That's your job.  Mine is    to open the children's minds... to    history... to literature... to    mathematics... to science...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You are opening the children's    minds... to blasphemy.  And I cannot    permit it to continue.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Sorry I couldn't get here sooner.     Another fusion reactor went down.     How's it going?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Done.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Done?       Did you remember to re-initialize    the isolinear co-processor?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I did it exactly like you showed me.     Should I test it?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Let me.  You know us old folks.  We    like to feel useful.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Not bad, not bad at all.       If you keep this up, I'm going to be    out of a job.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I doubt that.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Let's close her up.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Not that one... this is a security    seal.  You need an E-J-Seven Interlock    to open or close it.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: E-J-Seven?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (goes for his own     tool box)   Never mind... I've got one.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Bloody hell.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: What's wrong?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: My E-J-Seven.  It's missing.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Maybe you left it in Ops.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (beat, shakes his     head)   I don't misplace my tools.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not exactly surprised.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You knew this was going to happen?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: A confrontation like this was    inevitable.       Sometimes, I wonder if we'll ever    find the common ground we need to    bring Bajor into the Federation.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Major, would you join us?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: We've been talking about an incident    this morning at the school...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I heard... Vedek Winn has been meeting    with some of the Bajoran civilians    about it...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: What do you know about her?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: She's from an orthodox order... she    has some support to become the next    Kai... but probably not enough...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The question is how much support    does she have on this station?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: She has mine.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You can't possibly believe teaching    the facts about the wormhole amounts    to blasphemy...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I think some revisions in the school    curriculum might be appropriate...    you teach a lot of Bajoran children...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not going to let a Bajoran    spiritual leader dictate what can or    can't be taught in my classroom...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Then maybe we need two schools on    this station... one for Bajoran    children and another for the    Federation...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: If we start separating Bajoran and    Federation interests...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: A lot of Bajoran and Federation    interests are separate, Commander...    I've been telling you that all along.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Nobody's saying there can't be    spiritual teaching on this station,    Major... but why can't it be in    addition to what's taught in Mrs.    O'Brien's classroom...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: But if she's teaching a fundamentally    different philosophy...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not teaching any philosophy...    I'm trying to teach pure science...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Some might say pure science, taught    without a spiritual context, is a    philosophy, Mrs. O'Brien...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: My philosophy is that there is room    for all philosophies on this station.       How do you suggest we deal with this?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not sure you can.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I can't tell you how much I've looked    forward to this moment.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm honored to meet the Emissary to    the prophets.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: If you'd let me know you were coming,    Vedek Winn, I would have greeted you    sooner.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Pardon me, Emissary... I did not    wish to bother you with my    insignificant visit...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'd hardly call it insignificant.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (deliberately mistaken     as a compliment)   Thank you, Emissary.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I wish you wouldn't call me that...    I'm Commander Sisko... or Benjamin,    if you'd like...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: But you are the Emissary.  Don't you    know the cherished place you've earned    in the Bajoran spiritual life... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not sure I'm comfortable in that    role.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The course the prophets choose for    us may not always be comfortable.     But we must follow it.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: May I?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Still the disbeliever.       I once asked Kai Opaka why a    disbeliever was destined to seek the    prophets.  She told me one should    never look into the eyes of one's    own gods.       I disagreed.  I told her I would do    anything to look into their eyes.     She suggested that I sit in darkness    for a day and quite properly so.     She cannot be replaced.  I miss her    deeply.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's important to me that we resolve    your problems with the school.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The prophets have spoken to me through    the orbs, Emissary.  I understand my    duty to defend the Bajoran faith.     The teacher has dishonored the    celestial temple.  If she does not    recant, I cannot be responsible for    the consequences.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: This still seems like an awful lot    of trouble to go through to find one    tool.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: With that Interlock, someone could    access every critical system on the    station.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No... now that you mention it.

quote: Have you talked to Odo?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I guess I'd better.

quote: Scanners are ready.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Computer, show location of any    independent tritanium sources...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Level three, section five...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Now what's that?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Looks like something in a power    conduit on level twelve, section    eight.

quote: Conduit deactivated.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Come on...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Over here, Chief.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's a tritanium composite, all right.     Looks like our missing Interlock.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It must have been melted by the    conduit's plasma flow.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (while continuing his     scan)   That still doesn't explain how it    got here in the first place.    (notices something on     his tricorder)   Huh...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm picking up traces of organic    material.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Let's take a sample to Doctor Bashir,    see what he makes of it.

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Seek the prophets.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Seek them yourself.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (looking back at the     Kiosk)   Maybe you were right... we've got no    business here... I'll just put in    for a transfer and that'll be...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No... I can't run away from this    now...       What's this...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: If we abandon the Prophets, then    everything we have will be...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Here's Mrs. O'Brien now.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Good morning.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Are you Mister O'Brien?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: That's right.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: A pleasure to meet you.  I've been    listening to many wonderful things    about your wife from the parents of    these children.  She's apparently an    excellent teacher.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: She doesn't deserve what you're doing    to her.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I feel your anger toward me... I    accept it and forgive you for it.       Mrs. O'Brien, if I've misjudged you,    I am terribly sorry.  Have I?  Is    there a place in your school for the    prophets?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I admire you for standing by your    convictions.  Even though I disagree    with them.  Please believe me, I    want to find a way to allow these    children to stay in your school...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm sure the children and their    parents are happy to hear you say    that.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Let me be the one to make the first    concession.  I will no longer request    that you teach anything about the    celestial temple.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Just don't teach anything about the    wormhole at all.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Ignore it... ?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Find other things to teach the    children.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: And when we get to theories of    evolution or the creation of the    universe, what then...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: We'll face those issues when we come    to them.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm a teacher.  My responsibility is    to expose my students to knowledge.     Not hide it from them.  The answer    is no.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I've tried to be reasonable.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: If Aquino turned off the conduit to    fix the relay... why did it    reactivate.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The Cardassians only equipped those    power conduits with one flow regulator    per level.  The computer could've    realigned it.  When the power flow    was rerouted back, it could've caught    him inside.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You don't sound entirely convinced.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No, it all adds up only... I don't    know...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Spit it out, Chief.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (laughs sadly, it     seems ridiculous in     context)   He borrowed one of my tools without    asking.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It was four in the morning.  Maybe    he didn't want to bother you.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The repairs could've waited til the    next day.       He was a Starfleet engineer... you    don't take the Chief's tools without    asking... it's unheard of...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Are you suggesting it might not have    been an accident?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I don't know what I'm suggesting.  I    only know what I know.  He should've    asked.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Constable, maybe you ought to take a    closer look into this...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Dismissed.       Hi.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Can I talk to you for a minute.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Sure.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I heard what happened at school.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Did Mrs. O'Brien call off classes?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No.  There was only me and four other    kids left, but she still kept the    school open.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: She changed the lesson to teach us    about Galileo.  Did you know he was    tried by the Inquisition for teaching    that the earth moved around the sun?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Tried and convicted.  His books were    burned.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: How could anyone be so stupid?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's easy to look back seven centuries    and judge what was right and wrong.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: But the same thing is happening now!     All this stuff about a celestial    temple in the wormhole is dumb.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No, it's not.  You've got to    understand something, Jake.  For    over fifty years, the one thing that    allowed Bajorans to survive the    Cardassian occupation was their faith.     The prophets were their only source    of hope and courage.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: But they weren't prophets.  They    were just some aliens that you found    in the wormhole.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: To those aliens, the future is no    more difficult to see than the past.     So why shouldn't they be considered    prophets?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Are you serious?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: My point is it's a matter of    interpretation.  It may not be what    you believe, but that doesn't make    it wrong.  If you start to think    that way, you'll be acting just like    Vedek Winn.  Only from the other    side.       We can't afford to think that way,    Jake.  We'd lose everything we've    worked for here...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (beat, studying his     dad)   You're worried, aren't you...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: What're you gonna do?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm not sure.  But I think I've got    to find some help.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm sorry for keeping you waiting,    Commander Sisko.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Vedek Bareil... ?
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Please.  There is no need to pay    tribute to me, Commander...
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Pay tribute... ?  No, I was just...       Usually, when I meet one of Bajor's    spiritual leaders, the first thing    they do is grab my...
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: ... Ear?
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Unpleasant, isn't it.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I've been far too polite to admit    it.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I was five the first time one of the    monks grabbed my ear... he was a    stern old crow who could virtually    squeeze the pagh right out of you    with his thumb and forefinger... and    as a chronic misbehaver, I was his    favorite victim.  I swore that one    of my life's goals would be to do    away with that archaic ritual.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (feeling comfortable     with this man, smiles,     not too serious)   You can count on the Federation's    support.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I hope you don't mind if I get a    little planting done while we talk...    All the hours listening to a hundred    and twelve Vedeks talking at once    makes me yearn again for the sanctity    of my arboretum...
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Is this yours?
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I started my service at the monastery    as the gardener, Commander.  I had    no ambitions other than to grow the    most lovely Feloran bromiliads on    the planet.  But the prophets did    not allow me that peaceful life.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I understand my friend Vedek Winn
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I was hoping you might be able to    arrange an audience with the assembly    so I could discuss our school.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Why me?
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You are the leading candidate to be    the next Kai.  And, if I've been    correctly informed, your ideology is    quite different than Vedek Winn's.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: You have been correctly informed.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm sorry.  But the Vedek Assembly    will not see you, Commander.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Why not?
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Some fear you as the symbol of a    Federation they view as godless.     Some fear you as the Emissary who    has walked with the prophets.  Some    fear you because Vedek Winn told    them to.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: We're all very good conjuring up    enough fear to justify whatever we    want to do.  Today, I am only a Vedek.     If the prophets will it, someday, I    may be Kai.  And I can be a better    friend to you then.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: In other words, being my friend now    might hurt your chances.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The prophets teach us patience.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It appears they also teach you    politics.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I'm sorry you've made the long trip    for nothing.  Please stay and enjoy    the gardens as long as you like.
scene: 26   EXT. MONASTERY OF THE KAI - WOODED GARDEN - DAY
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Is it my imagination or are we a    little short handed today?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Three Bajoran crewmen didn't report    for duty.       They... said they weren't feeling    well.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Do you think it's contagious, Major?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's too early to tell.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Are your people willing to throw    away everything we've accomplished    during the past seven months?
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (would never go that     far)   Everyone knows that if the Federation    leaves the Cardassians will be back...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: With all due respect, Major,    protecting your borders is not the    primary reason the Federation is    here and it's not why I'm here.  I'm    here to build a trusting relationship    with your people... and I'd like to    start feeling that somebody...       ... somebody on your side is giving    something back to this effort.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I think I've given you all the support    I can, short of...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It's not enough.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I thought there was room on this    station for all philosophies.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: May the prophets forgive you for    abandoning them.

quote: You claim the prophets as your    personal constituency, Vedek Winn.     I'm not convinced that's justified.     Who do you speak for?  An order that    is barely listened to in your    assembly... so you come here looking    for a more receptive audience.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: Is that what your friend, Vedek Bareil    told you?  He's as misguided as you    are.       No, that's not fair... you are not    simply misguided... as I once thought.     Now I see that you want nothing less    than to destroy us.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: ... It attracted travelers from many    other worlds... now, to see a    schoolhouse destroyed, to see the    pursuit of education halted... it is    indeed a sad day for Bajor. episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: It is time to forge a new beginning...    to accept new ideas, not to be afraid    of them... to reject violence as a    solution, to join hands with all    peoples and begin to trust again...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: No!
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The prophets spoke.  I answered their    call.  The prophets spoke.  I answered    their call.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: (almost doesn't believe     it herself)   It was all to get him here, wasn't    it.  The school, the protests... the    bombing.  You knew that would bring    him out of the monastery.  You did    it all to kill him, to stop him from    becoming Kai.
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: The prophets spoke.  I answered their    call.

quote: Okay... ?  I've forgotten "okay."     Haven't seen "okay" in what seems    like years.       I've been sitting here thinking. If you'd've    stopped by and told me in just one    year, they'd be gone, and I'd be    wearing a uniform, up here in    charge of protecting some    wormhole...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: ... protecting your celestial temple...
episode: In the Hands of the Prophets

quote: I envied Vedek Winn because she was    a true believer... I wanted my faith    to be as strong as hers.

quote: I have a report to put together for    Starfleet... you ought to get some    rest...

quote: Then I guess we've made some progress    after all.
